price: 47 sans que nul parmi vous ne puisse s’y opposer.
arabic: فَمَا مِنكُم مِّنۡ أَحَدٍ عَنۡهُ حَٰجِزِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: famā minkum min aḥadin ʿanhu ḥājizīna
